name: Boobs Puzzle 2 ~| 胸部拼图
description:
Boobs Puzzle 2 ~| 胸部拼图 is a type of puzzle game where you need to match at least two same-colored tiles, in order to win points, unlock power ups, clear the board and advance throughout new levels. Connect matching tiles in large amounts to win huge prizes in the game.

The game made up of boards filled with colored blocks. As you match groups of two or more blocks, you’ll see the columns and rows cascade down the board, earning you more points.

The more blocks you match, the more points you earn! You can also unlock special power ups to help you on your mission, or overcome ‘locked’ blocks that make it harder for you to clear the rows and columns.Features:
  • fun and addictive gameplay
  • simple game mechanic
  • 15 more complex levels
  • Gallery of received arts
